pr_title: interop-testing: Avoid alts incompatibility with netty

timeline.message:
interop-testing: Avoid alts incompatibility with netty

alts requires netty-shaded, not netty.

timeline.bodyText: Just checking - is the comment still relevant with this change?
timeline.author: sergiitk

replies.bodyText: Yes. The useOkHttp = false was to enable Netty, to work with these credentials. But it enabled the wrong Netty and so failed at runtime. With this change we now enable the other (shaded) Netty to guarantee the credentials and channel type are compatible.
replies.author: ejona86
